lead_paragraph: The free-agent catcher Nick Hundley, 31, hit .243 last year with 6 homers and 22 runs batted in in 83 games for San Diego and Baltimore.
snippet: The free-agent catcher Nick Hundley, 31, hit .243 last year with 6 homers and 22 runs batted in in 83 games for San Diego and Baltimore.

headline.main: Rockies Sign Catcher to a 2-Year Deal
headline.print_headline: Rockies Sign Catcher to a 2-Year Deal
